creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
description: blocky black and white image divided in sections; human figure at R holding long object, appears to be yelling; two figures in small building at C, text and workers nearby; laborer at LL hammering a vessel, and one at LR turning an object on a lathe; harvesting scene at top
inscription:
at top, from right: 煙下　火ザヤ　炉
in center: 一、火の粉　吹き出す　あの火の　下にや　ヤガエフ　いとし　主さん　たたら　踏む
at bottom: ロクロ旋掛け　象炭
portfolio: From Ironmonger's Marching Song (Yagaefu やがえ節)
title: Second song (part 4)
